label: AppliedTax
comment: A total levy or payment for the support of a government that is required of persons, groups, or businesses within the domain of that government.

objectProperties.comment: The code specifying the applied tax type such as VAT.
The monetary value used as the basis in calculating the applied tax.
The monetary value resulting from the calculation of the applied tax.
The rate used to calculate the applied tax.

referencedBy.comment: The applied tax category of this applied allowance charge.
